answers.answer: I have suffered with bad migraines also. Not much can be done. Have u tried caffeine? It helps mine sometimes. I haven't tried this one but put hands an feet in warm/hot water w ice on your neck. I keep reading about it an that it works. Good luck
Try taking Tylenol in if it still doesn't go away call your doctor. That can be a sign if high blood pressure & preeclampsia
i have tried caffine & tylonol. nothing is helping :'(
Mine only lasted 2days all I did was sleep and I haven't got it since

Try drinking water or Gatorade, you might be dehydrated. I get headaches like that if I'm dehydrated but other times I wasn't so I went to ob triage & got a prescription for my migraines. Which helped
ive tried food & ive had enough water to drown a dog. my ob wont give me a prescription for my headaches until im past 24 weeks

question: im getting massive headaches. i think more migraines now. ive had one for 2 days now and its killing me! any relief!?
title: headaches!
